header.name: Rahul Sharma
header.bio: DevOps engineer with 2.3 years of experience in CI/CD Integration, Docker, K8s and python. with a flair for creating elegant solutions in the least amount of time. Recognized consistently for performance excellence and contributions to success.

description: Developed a cloud-based SaaS platform with business tools (CRM, document management, finance, HR, analytics) using microservices architecture. Ensured scalability, high availability, and seamless integration across tools. Implemented DevOps practices for automation, CI/CD, and monitoring to deliver features rapidly and securely.

projects.name: BPM
responsibilities: Automated infrastructure with Terraform/Ansible on AWS
Built CI/CD pipelines using Jenkins for zero-downtime deployments
Set up monitoring (Prometheus/Grafana) and logging (ELK Stack)
Enforced security via IAM, VPCs, and vulnerability scans
Optimized cloud costs with auto-scaling and spot instances, Collaborated using Git, Jira, and Confluence.

description: Developed and maintained CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins for automated build, test, and deployment
Automated infrastructure provisioning and management using Terraform and Ansible
Managed Kubernetes (K8s) clusters for scalable and efficient application deployments
Implemented monitoring and logging with Prometheus and Grafana; handled DataBase Administration and data migration for optimized performance

projects.name: DataOps
responsibilities: Used DataOps.live, Git, and Bash to automate data pipelines. Integrated DBT for transformations and SnowFlake for cloud warehousing
Containerized applications with Docker and managed AWS deployments. Used SOLE Generator for cloud infrastructure setup and scaling

projects.name: Noaris Dashboard
responsibilities: Developed RESTful APIs using FastAPI for high-performance web services, leveraging Python for backend logic
Implemented automated tests with Pytest to ensure code quality and reliability, achieving comprehensive test coverage
Provision cloud application resources using AWS CDK
Integrated Elasticsearch for robust search capabilities, enabling efficient querying and real-time data indexing

projects.name: Qopla Application
responsibilities: Used Terraform to automate the provisioning of K8s clusters and MySQL databases, ensuring consistent and scalable environments
Implemented CI/CD pipelines in Bitbucket for automated Docker container builds and deployments to K8s clusters, enhancing deployment efficiency
Configured Grafana for real-time monitoring and integrated HashiCorp Vault for secure management of sensitive data and secrets

description: Developed and maintained web front-end using HTML and CSS
Created and tested APIs using Flask, ensuring reliable backend services
Implemented automated monitoring solutions with New Relic and BlazeMeter, improving system reliability and performance
Conducted thorough testing to ensure application functionality and performance

projects.name: Reporting dashboard
responsibilities: Developed a dynamic reporting dashboard using Python with Flask, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap to visualize and analyze data effectively
Implemented version control and collaboration using Git and GitHub, ensuring seamless team workflow and project management
Designed responsive user interfaces with Bootstrap, enhancing accessibility and user experience across different devices
